newsitem.title: USA: Swift Transportation to buy Navajo Shippers assets.
newsitem.headline: Swift Transportation to buy Navajo Shippers assets.

text.p: Swift Transportation Co Inc said on Friday it entered a letter of intent to buy operating assets utilised in the dry freight van division of Navajo Shippers and its wholly owned units Navajo and Digby-Ringsby of Denver.

The combined dry freight revenues for Navajo Shippers have been in excess of $40 million. The assets to be purchased consist of a terminal in Pueblo, Colorado, QualComm mobile communication terminals, and 428 van trailers.
Swift will also assume leases on 258 company tractors and 30 owner-operators in the acquisition. Total consideration for the assets purchased will be approximately $7.3 million.
